alert.note: Alert for Dent (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued June 07 at 5:15PM CDT until June 08 at 3:00AM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 915 PM CDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of south central Missouri, including the following county, Dent. * WHEN...Until 915 PM CDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Water over roadways. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 513 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Between 1 and 3 inches of rain have fallen. Additional rainfall up to 1 inch expected. - This includes the following low water crossings... Meramec River at Spur Road. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Stone Hill and Howes Mill. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Many flood deaths occur in vehicles.
